## Software used by SDS classes

These applications should be installed on the Science image, particularly on the lectern computer in Sabin Reed 301.

**All software should be the latest general available (GA) release unless otherwise noted**

### SDS 136

* [Tableau](http://www.tableau.com) - if we ever got a site license for it; I know CATS was talking about it

### SDS 192

* [MySQL Workbench](https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/workbench/)
* [GDAL](http://trac.osgeo.org/gdal/wiki/DownloadingGdalBinaries)
